html: 4.14.24  10:47 pm   you know that thing where tons of people think modern music sucks because they only remember the really good stuff from a long time ago? well, i feel the same thing about my own (as of yet unrecorded) song ideas (and on a much shorter timescale - ie a year or so). i feel like a disproportionate amount of my new song ideas are just boring and dead feeling, or just overall super uncreative, and it's a shitty feeling, especially when i look back fondly at ideas from a year or 2 ago. i'm wondering, have you ever experienced this with your own song ideas? any thoughts on the matter? thanks
